trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> element with <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> attribute from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

This class is used within complex types that reference a <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> defined at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""></xref> level.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef"></xref> class.

Gets one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes, which holds the post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property.

The post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property, which is one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes.
Gets or sets the name of a group defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The `RefName` value must be a QName.
The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix.
To include a group in a `complexType` element, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the group to include in this schema.
The name of a group defined in this schema.
